884790.name: XXX Puzzle: Season Pass
884790.description:
This season pass includes all DLC's for XXX Puzzle:

  • XXX Puzzle: Expansion Pack 1 + Exclusive level
  • XXX Puzzle: Expansion Pack 2 + Exclusive level
  • XXX Puzzle: Expansion Pack 3 + Exclusive level
  • XXX Puzzle: Expansion Pack 4 + Exclusive level

The purchase of such a pass will help you save 25%.
The total duration of the game is 8-10 hours (40+4 Levels).
